AssetGroupAsset.note: field_type values: HEADLINE, LONG_HEADLINE, DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_NAME, IMAGE, YOUTUBE_VIDEO

AssetGroupSignal.note: Used for audience signals (first-party or interest segments).

AssetGroupListingGroupFilter.note: Used for Merchant Center product group filters in Shopping-enabled P-Max campaigns.

AssetSet.note: Container for site-links, callouts, price extensions etc.

queryTemplates.campaignMetrics: SELECT campaign.id, campaign.name, metrics.clicks, metrics.impressions, metrics.conversions FROM campaign WHERE segments.date DURING LAST_30_DAYS
queryTemplates.assetGroups: SELECT asset_group.id, asset_group.name, asset_group.status, asset_group.campaign FROM asset_group WHERE campaign.id = {campaign_id}

notes: All mutate operations require an `operations` array.
`update_mask` must specify changed fields on updates.
All field names use snake_case when using google-ads-api Node.js library.
Performance Max campaigns cannot have ad groups or keywords; use AssetGroups instead.
Site-links are linked through AssetSet + AssetSetAsset, not directly in the campaign.
Use GoogleAdsService.searchStream for all reporting queries.
